name: BelVG
description:
About us
BelVG is an ecommerce development company based in Minsk, Belarus. We also have office in Latvia and representatives in Austria and Canada.
What we do
We make webstores since 2004 and work with the most popular ecommerce platforms Magento and Prestashop for almost 10 years.
We develop various extensions to these platforms, which are available on our Magento and Prestashop stores.
We also can develop a new extension according to your requirements and wishes.
Our team
Only professionals work at BelVG. In our team there are:
18 Magento-certified and Magento-trained developers;
8 Zend-certified engineers;
8 PrestaShop-certified developers.
Our experience
For more than 10 years of experience, we launched hundreds of projects all over the world. We not just develop webstores but help companies to go live and become local market leaders.
Take a look at our portfolio to see realized projects. Maybe the next story about successful collaboration will be yours!
